page.title: 09Transport and Shopping
page.content: Although there is a great variety of shops in {Yaxley}the majority of people interviewed said that they did there main weekly food shopping in Peterborough as prices were more competitive. The figures were as follows for the sample interviewed: one eight did their main weekly shopping in the village where as seven eight did it in Peterborough,although all of these did some shopping in the village e.g. bakery,butchers, greengrocers etc. There was some link between car ownership and shopping patterns as none of the people who did there shopping in the village owned a car. Nine tenths of the sample had one car and a quarter of these had two.People were quite happy with the regular half hourly bus service to Peterborough.
